segments.text: Excuse me . Do you know how to get to the mall ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I used to work there . Go straight for about a mile , then turn left at the light . The mall will be on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the address is 541 Main street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you write it down for me please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it faster if I take Highland avenue ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , that way is longer . There are more stop lights on that street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you're right . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
